Posts.Content: deemarie wrote: I had breast cancer in 20005,it came back in september 20009 I was treated with chemo know radiation, now I am on arimidex, I have to take it for five years, I go back for a ct scan in april,so far so good. OkÂ  would I consider myself cured if nothing show up on my ct scan? i want to fight and win not go into remission, can 1v be cured,my NP said I will be fine,never said cured, Give me some feedback on thius please. I am 60 years young in great health no high blood pressure or diabetes and i walk every day. I gave up meat and all processed food,and i never smoked or drank.I am on ssd, ok ladies thats it in a nutshell. Have a good bless day.Oh I have to alsp that her2neu every 3 weeks Dx 9/15/2008, Stage IV, mets, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: greeting deemarie dreamwriter
